statements: SELECT * FROM player_profiles
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM player_profiles
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player_profiles WHERE player_score > 100
SELECT player_name, player_email, player_score FROM player_profiles ORDER BY player_score DESC
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_profiles WHERE player_email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_score FROM player_profiles WHERE player_score > 100 ORDER BY player_score DESC, player_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player_profiles WHERE player_email IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM player_profiles ORDER BY player_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT player_name, player_email, player_score FROM player_profiles WHERE player_score BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY player_score ASC
SELECT * FROM player_profiles
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_score > 100
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level, player_score FROM player_profiles ORDER BY player_level DESC
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level < 10
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_score FROM player_profiles WHERE player_score BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY player_name ASC
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_score > 1000;
SELECT player_name, games_played, total_wins FROM player_profiles JOIN player_statistics ON player_profiles.player_id = player_statistics.player_id;
SELECT player_name, SUM(total_wins) AS total_wins FROM player_statistics GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_wins > 5;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player_profiles WHERE player_rank > 100;
SELECT player_name, player_rank FROM player_profiles ORDER BY player_rank DESC;
SELECT player_email FROM player_profiles WHERE player_rank < 50 ORDER BY player_rank ASC;
SELECT player_name, player_rank FROM player_profiles WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY player_rank ASC;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player_profiles WHERE player_rank > 5 ORDER BY player_name ASC

SELECT player_name, player_email, games_played FROM player_profiles JOIN player_statistics ON player_profiles.player_id = player_statistics.player_id WHERE player_statistics.games_played > 100 AND player_statistics.wins > player_statistics.losses
SELECT * FROM player_leaderboards WHERE leaderboard_type = 'monthly' ORDER BY leaderboard_rank DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT player_profiles.player_name, player_statistics.wins, player_statistics.losses, player_leaderboards.leaderboard_name FROM player_profiles JOIN player_statistics ON player_profiles.player_id = player_statistics.player_id JOIN player_leaderboards ON player_statistics.player_id = player_leaderboards.leaderboard_id WHERE player_leaderboards.leaderboard_rank <= 3 ORDER BY player_statistics.wins DESC

SELECT player_leaderboards.leaderboard_name, player_leaderboards.leaderboard_rank, player_profiles.player_name, player_statistics.games_played FROM player_leaderboards JOIN player_profiles ON player_leaderboards.leaderboard_id = player_profiles.player_id JOIN player_statistics ON player_leaderboards.leaderboard_id = player_statistics.player_id WHERE player_statistics.games_played > 50 AND player_statistics.wins > player_statistics.losses ORDER BY player_statistics.games_played DESC
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_id, username FROM player_profiles ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, email FROM player_profiles WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT player_id, wins, losses FROM player_statistics WHERE wins > losses;
SELECT player1_id, player2_id, result FROM player_comparisons WHERE result = 'Tie';
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT username, email, join_date FROM player_profiles WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, games_played, wins, losses FROM player_statistics WHERE games_played > 50 AND wins > losses;
SELECT player_id, ranking, score FROM leaderboard ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player1_id, player2_id, result FROM player_comparisons WHERE result = 'tie' ORDER BY player1_id, player2_id;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_score > 1000;
SELECT player_name, player_email, player_statistics.games_played FROM player_profiles JOIN player_statistics ON player_profiles.player_id = player_statistics.player_id;
SELECT * FROM leaderboard ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_statistics.games_played FROM player_profiles JOIN player_statistics ON player_profiles.player_id = player_statistics.player_id WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles ORDER BY player_level DESC, player_name;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM player_profiles WHERE player_score BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT player_name, wins FROM player_profiles JOIN player_statistics ON player_profiles.player_id = player_statistics.player_id WHERE wins > 10;
SELECT player1_id, player2_id, comparison_result FROM player_comparisons WHERE comparison_result = 1 ORDER BY player1_id ASC;
